FERMENTABLE.NAME: Acid Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Acid malt can and has been historically used to adjust mash pH without the use of additives

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Amber Dry Extract
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Amber colored dry malt extract. Use as a base in medium colored beers.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Amber Liquid Extract
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Amber colored liquid malt extract. Use as a base in medium colored beers.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Amber Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Warm biscuit flavor with coffee undertones. Must be mashed.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Aromatic Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Strong malt aroma

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Barley Hulls
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Improve the speed of lautering. Hulls are neutral in flavor, body and color and do not ferment

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Barley, Flaked
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds significant body and haze producing protein.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Barley, Raw
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds body. Requires fine milling and multistage mash.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Barley, Torrefied
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Raw barley. Produces protein haze.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Biscuit Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Biscuity flavor and aroma, similar to toasted malt.
FERMENTABLE.STYLES: English ales, brown ales and porters

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Black Patent Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Dry roasted flavor and dark color.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Black Barley
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Dry coffee flavor.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Brown Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Biscuit flavor.
FERMENTABLE.STYLES: Brown ales, porters and Belgian ales.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Brown Sugar, Dark
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Rich and sweet.
FERMENTABLE.STYLES: Scottish ales, Holiday ales, Old ales.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Brown Sugar, Light
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Rich and sweet.
FERMENTABLE.STYLES: Scottish ales, Holiday ales, Old ales.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Candi Sugar, Amber
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Increases head retention and creates a sweet aroma.
FERMENTABLE.STYLES: Tripels, Dubbels, Holiday ales, Old ales.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Candi Sugar, Clear
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Increases head retention and creates a sweet aroma.
FERMENTABLE.STYLES: Tripels, Dubbels, Holiday ales, Old ales.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Candi Sugar, Dark
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Increases head retention and creates a sweet aroma. Adds some color.
FERMENTABLE.STYLES: Tripels, Dubbels, Holiday ales, Old ales.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Cane Sugar
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Can produce flavors similar to cider.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Dextrine Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Significantly increases foam/head retention and body of the beer.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Cara-pils
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Significantly increases foam/head retention and body of the beer.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Caraaroma
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds a strong caramel flavor, red color, and malty aroma.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Carafa I
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Used to intensify aroma and color

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Carafa II
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Used to intensify aroma and color.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Carafa III
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Used to intensify aroma and color.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Caramel Wheat Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds wheat malt aroma.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Caramel/Crystal Malt - 10L
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Contributes caramel or toffee flavor.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Caramel/Crystal Malt - 20L
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Contributes caramel or toffee flavor.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Caramel/Crystal Malt - 30L
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Contributes caramel or toffee flavor.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Caramel/Crystal Malt - 40L
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Contributes caramel and toasted bread flavor.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Caramel/Crystal Malt - 60L
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Contributes caramel and toasted bread flavor.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Caramel/Crystal Malt - 80L
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Contributes caramel or raisin flavor.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Caramel/Crystal Malt -120L
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Contributes caramel, burnt sugar, or raisin flavor.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Caramunich Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds toasty flavor and aroma.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Caravienne Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Light Belgian crystal malt.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Chocolate Malt (US)
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Dark red or brown color and nutty or chocolate flavor.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Chocolate Malt (UK)
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Dark red or brown color and nutty or chocolate flavor.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Chocolate Rye Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds color and subtle roasty character.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Chocolate Wheat Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Chocolate malt made from malted wheat

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Corn Sugar (Dextrose)
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Used for bottle carbonation, typically 2/3 cup per 5 gallons

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Corn Syrup
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Increases gravity without much flavor. Can add cider flavor if overused.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Corn, Flaked
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Reduces maltiness of beer.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Dark Dry Extract
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Increase gravity of any dark ale or lager.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Dark Liquid Extract
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Increase gravity of any dark ale or lager.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Extra Light Dry Extract
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Use as base or to increase gravity of any ale or lager.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Extra Light Liquid Extract
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Use as base or to increase gravity of any ale or lager.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Grits
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Imparts a corn or grain taste.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Honey
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds light flavor and body.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Honey Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Very sweet

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Invert Sugar
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Increases starting gravity.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Lager Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Base malt for lagers and light beers.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Light Dry Extract
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Base malt for any ale or lager.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Lyles Golden Syrup
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Increases gravity without affecting flavor.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Maple Syrup
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds a dry, woody flavor.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Melanoiden Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds malty flavor and aroma.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Mild Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds sweet malty flavor and aroma, and a rich golden color.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Milk Sugar (Lactose)
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds sweetness and gravity.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Molasses
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Strong sweet flavor.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Munich Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds malt sweetness and a reddish color

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Munich Malt - 10L
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds malt sweetness and a slight orange color.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Munich Malt - 20L
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds malt sweetness and an orange color.
FERMENTABLE.STYLES: Bock, Porter, Marzen, Oktoberfest 2.80 5.00 25.00 13.50 80.00 TRUE 0.00 0.0 oz 0.0 oz 1.0345 20.0 SRM Amber Liquid Extract

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Oats, Flaked
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds body, mouthfeel, haze, and head retention.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Oats, Malted
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds body, mouthfeel and head retention.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Pale Liquid Extract
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Use as a base malt for any ale or lager.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Pale Malt (2 Row) Bel
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Base malt for all beer styles

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Pale Malt (2 Row) UK
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Base malt for all English beer styles

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Pale Malt (2 Row) US
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Base malt for all beer styles

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Pale Malt (6 Row) US
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Base malt for all beer styles

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Pale Malt, Maris Otter
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Base malt for all styles from the UK. Slightly nutty.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Peat Smoked Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds a smoky flavor.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Pilsner (2 Row) Bel
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Use as a base malt for any ale or lager.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Pilsner (2 Row) Ger
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Use as a base malt for any ale or lager.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Pilsner (2 Row) UK
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Use as a base malt for any ale or lager.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Pilsner Liquid Extract
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Use as a base malt for any ale or lager.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Pilsner Dry Extract
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Use as a base malt for any ale or lager.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Rice Extract Syrup
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds gravity without affecting body or flavor.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Rice Hulls
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Neutral in flavor and aroma, and do not add fermentable sugars.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Rice, Flaked
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds gravity without affecting body or flavor.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Roasted Barley
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds astringent roasted, bitter, and coffee flavors.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Rye Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds a dry, crisp rye flavor.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Rye, Flaked
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds a dry, crisp rye flavor.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Smoked Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds a smoked flavor and aroma.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Special B Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds intense caramel and raisin flavors.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Special Roast
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds a toasted, biscuit like flavor and aroma

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Sugar, Table (Sucrose)
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Increases gravity and ABV. Too much can add a cider flavor.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Toasted Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds red/orange color, toasted flavor, and improved body without sweetness.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Treacle
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds an intense sweet flavor and dark color.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Victory Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds a Biscuit or toasted flavor.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Vienna Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds a golden to orange color to the beer.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Wheat Dry Extract
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Use as base or to increase gravity of any wheat beer.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Wheat Liquid Extract
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Use as base or to increase gravity of any wheat beer.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Wheat Malt (Bel)
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds wheat

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Wheat Malt, Dark
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds dark color, and wheat.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Wheat Malt (Ger)
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Malted wheat base for use in all wheat styles

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Wheat, Flaked
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds increased body and head retention

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Wheat, Roasted
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Chocolate malt made from malted wheat.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: White Wheat Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds malty flavor, and wheat.
